      • getAllPrefixes

        public java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> getAllPrefixes()
        Description copied from class: ExtendedNamespaceContext
        Get an Iterator that returns all prefixes in use in the Namespace, including the default if defined. The caller should use the returned values to call getNamespaceURI(valueFromIterator) to get the Namespace URIs associated with the prefix.
        Specified by:
        getAllPrefixes in class ExtendedNamespaceContext
        Returns:
